attributes.action: Enforce that people on Job seekers allowance earn there crust and put something back into society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I put it too you the people of Great Britain to make Britian great again.
How many millions of tax payers money is being wasted on fake job seekers.
I propose that people who claim job seekrs should be made to earn the job seekrs allowance whilst putting things into the community.
A community service helping vunerable people,cleaning the streets,working in charity shops,doing all they can to make us take pride within Britian.
This scheme would improve the country and save millions that could be better spent on the Nhs and the police force.
This would also stop the people who do not want to work from playing the system.
This would also learn people new skills

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
